name: Vikings Drunk JumpIn
description:
The new part of the Vikings JumpIn saga is now at the start. (Vikings Drunk JumpIn). You are a thirsty Viking and are trying to get the last beer before the other Viking does.

It is a run and jump/platformer game. There are a total of 4 levels that you have to complete. He likes to play an opponent who wants to finish first. The landscapes are beautifully created and pure run and jump action are also included. It is a nice and funny game for the ideal pastime. 4 Levels, smartphone control and the most important beer.

Control:

Move with the joystick, Jump with the Jump Button and Camera move by swiping the screen.

Genre:  Run and Jump, Platformer, Action and Fantasy.

For Smartphone Android 6.0.

Offline Game, Vikings.
